post.body: Still on standby. I have to call in at 3pm today re: jury duty tomorrow.
I think the half-birthday idea is sweet...that June be with her friends and December be with family.
Thanks for understanding my glasses angst!
Once in a while, Junior asks for help proofing, but we make her figure out how to fix whatever spelling or grammar issues herself.
What a lovely new font portrait you have this morning, though I prefer your face..
You could limit his access to your profile, so he'd stop seeing your status.
Not your Maria. Maria's, the new eastern European specialty food shop.
Yes, but I've never felt more Californian in my life.
I already dealt with this project, but thanks for the info.
Yes, I saw him there with my own eyes while shopping for Thanksgiving.
Ended up just making mashed potatoes and lamb. Thumbs down to Trader Joes's pre-cooked lamb.
Those glasses are fun. My new ones are designed by Cyril Dray http://tinyurl.com/4nqar5
Awesome customer service at I See GB today. Glasses can't be repaired, but Dayne took pix & embarked on international quest 2 make me happy.
RT @rogovoy: NY Times says Berkshire Eagle owner on brink of bankruptcy http://is.gd/bMOU
Need coffee. Negotiating.
My miracle (not just lucky) green glasses sprouted a crack yesterday. Husband insists that I'm more than my glasses. I'm not so sure.
Headed to Berkshire Living's "Rest of the Story" talk with MASS MoCA Director Joe Thompson about the Sol LeWitt exhibit. 11am, Triplex, FREE
Saveur cooking techniques and tips treasure trove: http://preview.tinyurl.com/64y9j8
There is a certain romance about the new ice scraper that quietly appeared in my car. He cares.
Cat and dog both bouncing off the walls bonkers about our Christmas tree.
Woke up cranky, realizing that the interview I conducted with R.M. in my dream hadn't actually happened.
Checking out Pittsfield Storefront Artists' shindig tonight.
Pilates is magic even after a breakfast of chocolate truffle cookies.
Icy iced-in Tweetgals, you know who you are, I'll go ahead and cancel our reservation. Boo hoo!
RT @AlgonquinBooks Newly laid-off NPR journalists on laid-off journalists' work prospects, on NPR (via Bookslut): http://tinyurl.com/64wtjl
Today's sugar and caffeine-spiked breakfast of champions: coffee and holiday chocolate truffle cookies. I may regret it during Pilates.
RT @rebeccawalker interesting rick warren convo on my blog http://tinyurl.com/a2ct29
Please join me for Blogging Boot Camp in Mexico: http://tinyurl.com/8qmrgt (I can't believe I used the word meta in a sentence.)
Finally checked out Maria's in Great Barrington. Came home with fresh babka from Brooklyn, Polish herring, and potato-cheese pierogi Ruskie.
This is not my native habitat.
Not too happy about Goose eating my purple boiled wool Garnet Hill slippers while I was out.
It's a slushy mess out there, but the forecast windstorm hasn't arrived yet. Glad I went to town. Glad I'm home now.
Plow just rumbled by. Time to shovel out the car. Get to Pilates even though I don't feel one bit like going this morning.
Strapping on snowshoes to take a mini hike in our woods.
I love how Facebook integrates the many eras of one's life. Just heard from a friend from high school who now lives in Australia.
Enjoying Dave's gift of the Hall & Oates Christmas album a bit too much. Might have to talk to Daryl next time I see him at Guido's.
All is quiet here in Winter save for the sound of the occasional snowplow rumbling by.
Oops no white beans in the house.
Making Emeril's lamb, potato & white bean stew. Cheating with Trader Joe's pre-cooked this and that, but hoping for the best w/ Dutch oven.
This may all prove true, but I'm not so into my phone yet. RT @debbiestier Pew Study On Future of Internet http://tinyurl.com/6otylu
